thread.title: US actor Randy Quaid ordered released; facing deportation
thread.title_full: US actor Randy Quaid ordered released; facing deportation

title: US actor Randy Quaid ordered released; facing deportation
text: > Entertainment US actor Randy Quaid ordered released; facing deportation Actor Randy Quaid, right, is escorted into his Immigration and Refugee Board hearing in Montreal, Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015. Quaid said in an interview that he could be deported from Canada next week and that he would like to resolve his legal issues in California and "move on with my life." The actor and his Canadian wife fled the U.S. in 2010, saying they were victims of persecution. (Peter McCabe/The Canadian Press via AP)
